segments.text: Oh dear , Miss , you are soaked ! Wow , it's really raining heavily outside .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , it sure is . I had to run here from work ! I need to rush as I'm on my lunch break .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well please , why don't you go ahead of me in line ? I'm in no hurry .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , that's so nice of you ! Thank you very much .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My pleasure Miss . Actually , could you recommend what to eat here ? I've never been here before .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . Well , the avocado sandwich is delicious , and it's the healthiest thing on the menu . Personally , I think the beef salad is the tastiest choice . I usually get that . Also , the milkshakes are the best milkshakes in town !
segments.speaker: S2
